emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Autonomy
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously developing, testing, and deploying software applications, reducing human intervention.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: This technology could lead to significant job displacement in software development, prompting discussions on re-skilling and job automation ethics.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High demand for automation in software development, regulatory approval for AI in critical systems, and ethical considerations regarding AI autonomy.

emerging_technologies.name: Mind-to-Machine Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Interfaces allowing direct communication between human brains and digital systems for control and data exchange.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhancements in cognitive abilities, ethical concerns about privacy and consent, potential for social stratification based on access to technology.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Progress in neuroscience, public acceptance, regulatory frameworks for human augmentation, and privacy laws.

emerging_technologies.name: Lunar Resource Utilization
emerging_technologies.description: Technologies for mining and processing resources on the Moon for use in space missions and potentially for Earth.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduction in space mission costs, new geopolitical dynamics regarding space resources, and potential environmental impacts on the Moon.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, international agreements on lunar resource rights, and investment in space infrastructure.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Autonomy
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that can autonomously develop, test, and deploy software applications.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in software development sectors, particularly in enterprises looking to reduce development cycles and costs.

epoch_themes.description: Advancements in AI and neural technologies are pushing boundaries in automation and cognitive enhancement.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for significant job automation, enhanced human capabilities, and ethical debates on AI governance and human rights in an augmented world.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, regulatory frameworks for human augmentation, and global collaboration in technology governance.

epoch_themes.description: The shift towards using extraterrestrial resources for space missions and potentially Earth's needs.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: New economic opportunities, shifts in global power dynamics, and environmental considerations for extraterrestrial bodies.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Development of space laws, international cooperation in space exploration, and public-private partnerships for space resource management.
